SEARCH
Package ProgettoLaboratorioB.Database

Class QueryExecutor

java.lang.Object
ProgettoLaboratorioB.Database.QueryExecutor
public class QueryExecutor extends Object
QueryExecutor class will be used to execute queries to the database when the client sends a request to the server. Database class will declare a QueryModule object, and it is a class that implements a mapping system between tables and relative queries that are defined in the postgres database; QueryExecutor needs also a Connection object to connect to the database.
Version:
0.0.1
Author:
Enrico Artese, Marco Buglioni.

  • Method Details

    • GetQueryObject

      public static QueryExecutor GetQueryObject(String url, String user, String password)
      This method will be used to get a QueryExecutor object.
      Parameters:
      url - is the url of the database
      user - is the username of the database
      password - is the password of the database
      Returns:
      a QueryExecutor object

    • LoadSongData

      public void LoadSongData()
      This method is used to load data from the song file to the database. If the song relation is empty, the method will load the data from the song file.

    • GetSongByTitle

      public static List<Song> GetSongByTitle(String title)
      This function is used to get all songs in the database, that have input String in the title.
      Parameters:
      title - is the title of the song to be searched.
      Returns:
      a list of songs that have the input String in the title.

    • GetSongYearTitle

      public static List<Song> GetSongYearTitle(String year, String artist)
      This function is used to get all songs in the database, by specifying the year and the artist.
      Parameters:
      year - is the year when the song was published.
      artist - is the artist of the song to be searched.
      Returns:
      a list of songs that have the input String in the artist.

    • GetSongsByID

      public static Song GetSongsByID(String id)
      This function is used to get a song in the database, by specifying the id.
      Parameters:
      id - is the id of the song to be searched.
      Returns:
      a song that has the input String in the id.

    • UserLogin

      public static User UserLogin(String username, String password)
      This function is called when a request to login in the system is received.
      Parameters:
      username - is the username of the user to be logged in.
      password - is the password of the user to be logged in.
      Returns:
      a User object if the user exists in the database, null otherwise.

    • RegisterNewUser

      public static boolean RegisterNewUser(String username, String password, String email, String name, String surname, String address, String CF)
      This function is called when a request to register a new user in the system is received.
      Parameters:
      username - is the username of the user to be registered.
      password - is the password of the user to be registered.
      email - is the email of the user to be registered.
      name - is the name of the user to be registered.
      surname - is the surname of the user to be registered.
      address - is the address of the user to be registered.
      CF - is the CF of the user to be registered.
      Returns:
      true if the user is registered successfully, false otherwise.

    • CreatePlaylist

      public static boolean CreatePlaylist(String plt_name, String username, String ID)
      This function is called when a request to create a new playlist in the system is received.
      Parameters:
      plt_name - is the name of the playlist to be created.
      username - is the username of the user that creates the playlist.
      ID - is the ID of the playlist to be created.
      Returns:
      true if the playlist is created successfully, false otherwise.

    • GetUserPlaylists

      public static List<Playlist> GetUserPlaylists(String username)
      This function is called when a request to get all playlists of a user is received.
      Parameters:
      username - is the username of the user that wants to get all his playlists.
      Returns:
      a list of playlists of the user.

      public static List<Song> GetSongsFromPlaylist(String playlist_id)

      Parameters:
      playlist_id - is the ID of the playlist that wants to get all his songs.
      Returns:
      a list of songs of the playlist.

    • AddSongToPlaylist

      public static boolean AddSongToPlaylist(String playlist_id, String song_id)

      Parameters:
      playlist_id - is the ID of the playlist that wants to add a song.
      song_id - is the ID of the song that wants to be added to the playlist.
      Returns:
      true if the song is added successfully, false otherwise.

      Returns:
      true if the emotion is registered successfully, false otherwise.
